name: 9 Useful Google Chrome Extensions for Web Designers | Tools
caption: webdesignledger.com
description: Compared to the other major web browsers, Google Chrome is still relatively new. However, it's popularity continues to grow rapidly. Here on WDL, Chrome is the

data.message:
Most of them are buggy I use this one for colors inspection:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/colorzilla/bhlhnicpbhignbdhedgjhgdocnmhomnp

For the Viewport I use a bookmarklet better than something that works in the background and it has all the phone, tablets and large screens sizes also you can test landscape and portrait:

http://lab.maltewassermann.com/viewport-resizer/
I've only used Web developers tools and yeah it's buggy but it's nice to have it in chrome (when it works).  I use Colorzilla on FF, didn't know it's on chrome now, Thanks :D
